MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.15pm due to a safety issue on the underground cable network on Braids Hill Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.04pm on Monday 1st March 2021.
